abstract: Paulo Almeida and design partner Marta Marques, who won LVMH Prize in May 2015, discuss future plans for their London-based fashion label Marques'Almeida.
lead_paragraph: Since winning the LVMH prize, Marta Marques and Paulo Almeida have focused their energy on growing their brand. T visits them at work in Hackney, London.

headline.main: Inside the Denim-Filled Studio of Marques’Almeida

snippet: Since winning the LVMH prize, Marta Marques and Paulo Almeida have focused their energy on growing their brand. T visits them at work in Hackney, London.
